body.p: The AI Threads page displays initial messages from users that interact with the AI Assistant. Users can interact with an AI Assistant on the current site, and as an admin, you will be able to filter and review these messages. Users with an Owner, Admin, or Moderator role have access to this page.

There are several options for filtering the threads:
You can click one of the thread status filter buttons to search for threads with a specific status (Useful, Not Useful, Invalidated, All).
You can use the drop-down menus next to the status filter buttons to search for comments for a specific version or time frame.
You can use the text field to search for specific content.

ol.li: Locate the message from the list.
Click on the "View Thread" button next to the message to access the full conversation with the AI Assistant.
Review the full context of the user's interaction and provide appropriate responses or actions.

body.p: On the right side of each message, you'll find indicators that describe the assessment of the message:

ul.li: Useful: This tag indicates that the message was considered helpful or informative.
Not Useful: This tag is assigned to messages deemed unhelpful or irrelevant.
Invalidated: Messages marked as invalidated may contain inaccurate information or not pertain to the content.
